title: Bite Marks
description: George is a mystery writer in a small town who wants nothing more than one date with the local bartender named Trudy. When he finally scores a date, he is ecstatic. But the night before he his bitten by a vampireâ€“and accidentally transformed into a member of the Undead. He assumes any chance he had with Trudy died the same night his need for food did. But, Trudy is more than she seems. A werewolf hunter on the run she knows all about vampires and if she can keep them both alive for any length of time, she might be just what George needs to survive. Can love survive an accidental bite?
author: Rebecca Royce
